text: the US is finally doing well at something regarding covid — making and distributing vaccines

elements.text: the US is finally doing well at something regarding covid — making and distributing vaccines

text: not as well as Israel, but pretty good

elements.text: not as well as Israel, but pretty good

text: US has produced plenty but they are not contributing to the worlds need of vaccines unfortunately

elements.text: US has produced plenty but they are not contributing to the worlds need of vaccines unfortunately

text: Logistic in Israel is easier but mostly the structure of the health service. Who knows, maybe it will make more countries copy Israel's structure.

elements.text: Logistic in Israel is easier but mostly the structure of the health service. Who knows, maybe it will make more countries copy Israel's structure.

text: I’m not sure if it’s the structure. From the stories I’ve heard it seems like it was the willingness there to (a) buy up enough vaccine for everyone at a national level and (b) give it out to anyone and everyone by any means necessary, even sending nurses out into public places to just give people vaccine shots

elements.text: I’m not sure if it’s the structure. From the stories I’ve heard it seems like it was the willingness there to (a) buy up enough vaccine for everyone at a national level and (b) give it out to anyone and everyone by any means necessary, even sending nurses out into public places to just give people vaccine shots

text: Good nationalized medicine was clearly huge for countries during the earlier phases of the pandemic though

elements.text: Good nationalized medicine was clearly huge for countries during the earlier phases of the pandemic though

text: I'm pretty sure it's the structure of the country. Every country could buy and pay. Pfizer chose Israel because of its health system structure. All doctors use the same system (Central) to handle data. The community health system is high quality and well spread. Teva, the company was given to handle the logistics for spreading the vaccine in the last 24 Hours and the huge number of community nurses managed to vaccine 0.5-1% of the population each day.

elements.text: I'm pretty sure it's the structure of the country. Every country could buy and pay. Pfizer chose Israel because of its health system structure. All doctors use the same system (Central) to handle data. The community health system is high quality and well spread. Teva, the company was given to handle the logistics for spreading the vaccine in the last 24 Hours and the huge number of community nurses managed to vaccine 0.5-1% of the population each day.

text: This structure is the prefect structure to do things quickly at the community level. There were no need to do anything special, just distribute the vaccine (Which is easier when you have the logistics of Teva + Small country).

elements.text: This structure is the prefect structure to do things quickly at the community level. There were no need to do anything special, just distribute the vaccine (Which is easier when you have the logistics of Teva + Small country).

text: The crazy thing is so many European countries would also seem perfect for vaccine rollout but it's not happening

elements.text: The crazy thing is so many European countries would also seem perfect for vaccine rollout but it's not happening

text:
Because their health system structure is different. Israel model is the perfect balance between free market and government service. You have 4 public health service companies (Not insurance, but health. The managers are public health guys).
The market is highly regulated (Even the amount of money they can spent on marketing). I believe that after the amazing performance of the vaccination operation the structure will be copied.
It is not only social health insurance, it is how the market is operating and regulated.

The market is highly regulated (Even the amount of money they can spent on marketing). I believe that after the amazing performance of the vaccination operation the structure will be copied.
It is not only social health insurance, it is how the market is operating and regulated.

text: Also Israel is amazing on the tactic levels on management. The amount of skilled people is amazing, probably more than any other country (Normalized to the amount of people). On the strategic one, let's say less :slightly_smiling_face:.
